Name: 破阵图(Grids of World)
About the game: The game is made based on the principle of Tic-Tac-Toe. In order to win, the player needs three consecutive strongholds to form a line. The game is made by UE4. Players can conduct game with computer or other players online. [Gameplay] In game,There are 9 strongholds in total. Attacking the stronghold requires all guard AIs to be killed. Otherwise, the attack to stronghold is invalid. Once the stronghold is occupied, the stronghold will be prompted on the UI interface in the upper right corner of the player. When the stronghold UI shows that the strongholds occupied by a certain team of players is three consecutive strongholds in a line,determine the team's victory.
